SFModelMBeanInfoBuilder

public SFModelMBeanInfoBuilder()
Default constructor. It creates a SFModelMBeanInfoBuilder without any target on which to make introspection.

                                                                                          java.util.Enumeration atMetadata)

Parameters:
targetObject - target to work on
atMetadata - an existing enumeration (can be null)
Returns:
the metadata as an array. If the enumeration is null, array is of size 0

                                                                                          java.lang.Object targetObject,
                                                                                          java.util.Enumeration opMetadata)
extract metadata from the opMetadata parameter; prints stack traces to stdout on case of trouble.

Parameters:
targetObject - target object
finder - Finder
opMetadata - metadata (can be null)
Returns:
an array of operation info. will be empty if opMetadata is null
